words.def: excessive desire to acquire or possess more (especially more material wealth) than one needs or deserves
a person who puts finishing edges on a garment
tall woody perennial grasses with hollow slender stems especially of the genera Arundo and Phragmites

distinguished from Bovidae by the male's having solid deciduous antlers

a unit of force equal to the force exerted by gravity

Something shaped like the letter D, such as a dee lock .
